description: From Middle English helply, equivalent to help +‎ -ly. Cognate with Middle Low German hulplik (“helply”), Middle High German helflich, helfelich (“helply”).

adjectives.description: helply (comparative helplier or more helply, superlative helpliest or most helply)

entries.meaning: (UK dialectal) Aiding; assisting; ready to help; helpful.
